summary: REQ-15 appears partially implemented: the “How do I submit my performance?” FAQ answer is updated as requested. However, due to truncation of frontend/src/pages/FaqsPage.tsx in the diff summary, the updated “What should my video include?” time limit and the specific 2026 timeline statements cannot be conclusively verified from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: In frontend/src/pages/FaqsPage.tsx, the “What should my video include?” answer states the time limit is around 2–4 minutes (and no longer suggests 3–10 minutes).
missing_requirements.reason: The relevant portion of the “What should my video include?” answer is truncated in the diff summary, so the updated time limit text is not visible/confirmable.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/FaqsPage.tsx (truncated at “What should my video include?” content)

missing_requirements.requirement: The FAQs page includes the application deadline as August 1st, 2026; states winners will be announced via email on September 1st, 2026; and states the performance will be mid November in Times Square.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for frontend/src/pages/FaqsPage.tsx does not show any of the 2026 deadline/announcement/performance timeline text, and the file is truncated before those details can be confirmed.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added repository metadata/summaries (frontend-file-summaries.txt) describing many other pages and features beyond the requested FAQ text updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update FAQ content (REQ-15) and explicitly includes constraints/non-goals; changing summary/metadata files is not requested.
BuildRequest does not request changing project state metadata; only FAQ content updates were requested.
